---
name: New Connector Request
about: Request support for a new database connector
title: '[CONNECTOR] '
labels: connector, enhancement
assignees: ''
---

## Database Type

Name and version of the database you'd like to see supported (e.g., MySQL 8.0, Oracle 21c, Redis 7.0).

## Migration Direction

- [ ] SQL → SQL
- [ ] SQL → NoSQL
- [ ] NoSQL → SQL
- [ ] NoSQL → NoSQL

## Use Case

Describe why you need this connector and what you're trying to migrate.

## Driver/Library

What Node.js driver or library should we use? (e.g., `mysql2`, `oracledb`, `redis`)

## Additional Context

- Is this for a specific migration you need to perform?
- Are there any special considerations or requirements?
- Links to documentation or driver repositories
